title: Financial Sector Update for 09/11/2019: SCHW, MA, BEN, JPM, BAC, WFC, C, USB - Nasdaq.com
text: Financial majors were narrowly mixed in  pre-market trading  Wednesday.
(-)   Charles Schwab  ( SCHW  ) was down almost 1% after Reuters reported that a company spokeswoman said the firm is planning to eliminate about 600 jobs, or roughly 3% of its total headcount.
(+) Mastercard ( MA  ) was more than 1% higher after saying it is teaming up with enterprise blockchain software firm R3 to develop a new blockchain-powered cross-border payments product.

(=) Franklin Resources ( BEN  ) was flat as i t report  ed preliminary assets under management of $690.6 billion as of Aug. 31, down from $709.5 billion on July 31, and from $722.4 at the end of August last year.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
